title: Is chat support for 1st Gen Pixel canceled?
content:
I was previously able to chat with Google support through accessing "settings" > "tips and support" on my 1st Gen Pixel handset.

Despite the preview menu of "tips and support" still showing "chat" (see the attached screenshot), when I click "tips and support" and open this tab, there is no chat option.

How can I chat with a support rep for Google Pixel?
